In our electronic-structure model for α-plutonium we consider, as in previous studies
24 , anti-ferromagnetic ordering with small net magnetic moments on the plutonium atoms (on average 0.15 μ B) due to the effective compensation between spin and orbital contributions. Spin fluctuations
38 or non-collinear spins are in principle not ruled out in this theory, but due to computing-resources boundaries, we limit ourselves to the anti-ferromagnetic static-spin regime.
